content: {"name": "Crisis Assistance Ministries of Gaston County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Form filling online on their website and they will call back to set an appointment", "email": "", "url": "https://crisisassistancegastonia.org/get-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "805 West Airline Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Gastonia", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28052", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2652078, "longitude": -81.1943817}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 867-8901", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
